fields.name: Runfalcon Trainers Mens
fields.description: Start clocking miles in these lightweight running shoes. On the treadmill or the streets, they add comfort to each step with soft cushioning. The supportive trainers have an airy material-mix upper and a midfoot cage for extra support.

fields.name: Pace VS Nubuck Mens Trainers
fields.description: The Mens adidas Pace VS Nubuck Trainers offer a simple and stylish look that is perfect for everyday wear, crafted with a simple nubuck upper with tonal stitched detail teamed with a two tone striped pull tab to the heel. A lace fastening front with a shaped and padded ankle collar and a cushioned insole provide a secure and comfortable fit, completed with the iconic adidas three stripes to the sides, perfect for everyday casual wear.

fields.name: VL Court 2 Suede Shoes Mens
fields.description: The adidas VL Court 2 Suede Shoes are a classic wear. Built with a lace fastening, cushioned ankle collar and Ortholite Float insole for comfort. With the iconic 3 stripes to the sidewall, the look is finished with adidas branding to the sole and tongue.

fields.name: Pace VS Nubuck Mens Trainers
fields.description: The Mens adidas Pace VS Nubuck Trainers offer a simple and stylish look that is perfect for everyday wear, crafted with a simple nubuck upper with tonal stitched detail teamed with a two tone striped pull tab to the heel. fields.name: Hoops Mid Leather Mens Trainers
fields.description: The adidas Hoops Mid Leather Trainers come in a stylish design with a lace up fastening, padded ankle and cushioned insole for a comfortable fit. The midsole is thick for a cushioned step and the sole has textured grip to improve traction. The perforations in the forefoot help with breathability and adidas branding completes the design.

fields.name: Copa Super Suede Trainers Mens
fields.description: These adidas Copa Super Suede Trainers are crafted with lace fastening and a padded ankle collar for a secure fit. They then further feature a cushioned insole for comfort and moulded sole for grip. These trainers are designed with a signature logo and are complete with adidas branding.

fields.name: Essence Squash Trainers Mens
fields.description: These adidas Essence Squash Trainers are crafted with lace fastening and a padded ankle collar for a secure, supported fit. fields.name: Under Armour Technical Training T Shirt Men's
fields.description: Train in comfort in this Under Armour Technical Training T Shirt, crafted with a ribbed crew neck and short sleeves, the top features incorporated heatgear technology designed to pull sweat away from the skin. Classic Under Armour branding sits to one side of the chest and to the back of the neck.

fields.name: Under Armour Technical Half Zip Top Mens
fields.description: This Under Armour Technical Half Zip Top is a lightweight fit, featuring HeatGear technology to assist in drawing sweat away from the body to keep you felling dry and comfortable all day long. Its long sleeve design and elasticated cuffs are teamed with a high necked collar with a half zipped fastening for a more personalised fit. Subtle Under Armour branding on the chest completes the overall look.

fields.name: Nike Breathe Short Sleeve T Shirt Mens
fields.description: Train in this Nike Breathe Short Sleeve T Shirt which offers the ultimate dry feeling thanks to its Nike Breathe fabrics and Dri Fit technology. Its lightweight design features flat lock seams to promote a more comfortable feel that reduces the risk of chafing and irritation. This training top is styled with classic short sleeves and a round neckline to offer you a easy wear that is ideal for training. A printed Nike Swoosh is presented to the left of the chest to complete the look. You do not want to miss out on this one.

These training shorts have breathable stretch side panels for added design and comfort, HeatGear technology to wick sweat away from the skin to leave you feeling dry, cool and comfortable and are completed with Under Armour branding.

fields.name: Nike Dry Training Shorts Mens
fields.description: The Nike Dry Training Shorts feature an elasticated waistband and drawstring fastening for a secure fit and are crafted from a lightweight Dry fabric with Dri-Fit to wick sweat away from the skin, keeping you dry and comfortable during your workout. Completed with two pockets and Nike branding.

fields.name: Nike Dry Training Shorts Mens
fields.description: The Nike Dry Training Shorts feature an elasticated waistband and drawstring fastening for a secure fit and are crafted from a lightweight Dry fabric with Dri-Fit to wick sweat away from the skin, keeping you dry and comfortable during your workout. Completed with two pockets and Nike branding.

fields.name: adidas 3 Stripe Training Shorts Mens
fields.description: The 3 Stripe Training Shorts from adidas are a perfect addition to your casual wardrobe. The shorts feature an internal drawstring, elasticated waist, 2 open pockets and AEROREADY technology which moves sweat from your skin helping you stay dry and comfortable for longer. The look is completed with the adidas branding.

fields.name: adidas 3 Stripe Training Shorts Mens
fields.description: The 3 Stripe Training Shorts from adidas are a perfect addition to your casual wardrobe. The shorts feature an internal drawstring, elasticated waist, 2 open pockets and AEROREADY technology which moves sweat from your skin helping you stay dry and comfortable for longer. The look is completed with the adidas branding.

fields.name: adidas 3 Stripe Training Shorts Mens
fields.description: The 3 Stripe Training Shorts from adidas are a perfect addition to your casual wardrobe. The shorts feature an internal drawstring, elasticated waist, 2 open pockets and AEROREADY technology which moves sweat from your skin helping you stay dry and comfortable for longer. The look is completed with the adidas branding.

fields.name: Canterbury CCC Logo Rugby Shorts Mens
fields.description: Step up your game of the field in the CCC Rugby Shorts from Canterbury. These shorts have been crafted in a regular fit with a jersey construction which is teamed with a elasticated waistband and a additional drawstring fastening for a secure and comfortable fit. The outer of the shorts features two front pockets and a singular pocket to the back as well as block colour and a large Canterbury logo located on ones of the legs for instant brand recognition.

fields.name: Under Armour 8 Inch Raid Short Mens
fields.description: Enjoy a comfortable and casual wear in these Under Armour 8 Inch Raid Training Shorts, crafted with an elasticated waistband with internal drawstring fastening, two open side pockets and an all over soft touch feel finish. These training shorts have breathable stretch side panels for added design and comfort, HeatGear technology to wick sweat away from the skin to leave you feeling dry, cool and comfortable and are completed with Under Armour branding.

fields.name: Nike Dry-Fit Shorts Mens
fields.description: Add to your activewear collection with the Nike Dry-Fit Shorts. Crafted with an elasticated waistband for a comfortable fit, this pair feature Dry-Fit technology that wicks sweat away form the skin leaving your dry and comfortable. Complete with the signature Nike swoosh logo printed to the leg, this pair are not one to be missed.

fields.name: Everlast Poly Shorts Mens
fields.description: Add to your activewear collection with the Everlast Poly Shorts. Crafted with an elasticated waistband for a comfortable fit, this par feature two zip pockets. Complete with EverDri technology that wicks sweat from the skin leaving you dry and comfortable, these shorts are finsihed with Everlast branding and are not one to be missed.

fields.name: adidas 3 Stripe Training Shorts Mens
fields.description: The 3 Stripe Training Shorts from adidas are a perfect addition to your casual wardrobe. The shorts feature an internal drawstring, elasticated waist, 2 open pockets and AEROREADY technology which moves sweat from your skin helping you stay dry and comfortable for longer. The look is completed with the adidas branding.

fields.name: Puma Interlock Shorts Mens
fields.description: Conquer your next workout with the Interlock Shorts from Puma. Crafted with an elasticated waistband and internal drawstring tie, these bottoms offer a super-comfortable and secure fit. Design is complete with a breathable, mesh lining and 2 open pockets.

fields.name: Nike Fundamentals Fleece Hoody Mens
fields.description: This Nike Men's Hoody offers a stylish, sporty look, benefiting from a fleece lining for comfort with a hooded design for extra protection and a drawstring pull for an adjustable fit. The Nike hoody features a kangaroo pocket for storage or to keep hands warm with elasticated cuffs and waist for a secure fit and is completed with the Nike swoosh. You do not want to miss out on this one, perfect for everyday comfort.

fields.name: Under Armour Rival Fitted Full Zip Hoody Mens
fields.description: Update your go-to-garms with the Rival Fitted Full Zip Hoody from Under Armour. Crafted with two hand pockets and ribbed trims, this piece is perfect for everyday wear. The soft brushed lining traps warmth and the Under Armour branding completes the stylish look.

fields.name: Slazenger Full Zip Hoody Men's
fields.description: Casual and a keen wardrobe staple, this Slazenger Full Zip Hoody leaves you with a comfortable fit and is ideal for everyday wear. This hoody has been crafted with a full length front zip fastening, two front pockets, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and hem and a soft fleece lining. Complete with the iconic embroidered Slazenger logo to the left of the chest. Do not miss out on this stunning piece. Invest in this piece while you can.

fields.name: New Balance Full Zip Hoody Mens
fields.description: Blending casual comfort and athletic styling, the New Balance Full Zip Hoody is the perfect cover-up. The full zip fastening allows for an adjustable fit, with a drawstring hood for full coverage and two front pockets for handy style. A New Balance circular logo completes the style.

fields.name: Nike Fundamentals Full Zip Hoody Mens
fields.description: This Nike Fundamentals Zipped Hoody, offers a classic look with a fully front zip fastening with a cotton lined hood and draw-cords for an adjustable fit and enhanced comfort. This Nike hoody is ideal for casual wear with elasticated cuffs and waist for a secure fit, two pockets for storage or keeping hands warm and is styled with the classic Nike Swoosh to the chest for a great look and instant brand recognition. Do not miss out on this classic piece, features long sleeves, a fixed hood and is breathable and lightweight. Get one while you can!

fields.name: Puma No1 OTH Hoodie Mens
fields.description: The Mens Puma No1 OTH Hoodie is a great addition to your casual wardrobe, crafted with a large pouch pocket to the front along with a lined hood with an adjustable drawcord, a ribbed trim to the cuffs and hem and a soft fleece lining provides a warm and comfortable fit, completed with the Puma branding to the chest.

fields.name: Nike Hybrid Hoodie Mens
fields.description: This Nike Hybrid Hoodie is crafted with full zip fastening and long sleeves with ribbed trims for comfort. It features a drawstring adjustable hood and 2 pockets for a classic look. This hoodie is a lightweight construction designed with a signature logo and is complete with Nike Swoosh branding.

fields.name: Nike Hybrid Hoodie Mens
fields.description: This Nike Hybrid Hoodie is crafted with full zip fastening and long sleeves with ribbed trims for comfort. It features a drawstring adjustable hood and 2 pockets for a classic look. This hoodie is a lightweight construction designed with a signature logo and is complete with Nike Swoosh branding.

fields.name: Converse Nova Hoodie Men's
fields.description: Keep things casual with this Converse Nova Hoodie. Constructed with a soft brushed-fleece lining for a comfortable fit, this hoodie is crafted with ribbed trims throughout, kangaroo pockets and drawstring to the hooded neckline. The look is finished with the Converse logo to the chest.

fields.name: Adidas Nova Hoodie Men's
fields.description: Keep things casual with this adidas Nova Hoodie. Constructed with a soft brushed-fleece lining for a comfortable fit, this hoodie is crafted with ribbed trims throughout, kangaroo pockets and drawstring to the hooded neckline. The look is finished with the adidas logo to the chest.

fields.name: Nike Dry Zip Hoody Mens
fields.description: Stay warm with this Nike Dry Zip Hoody, crafted with a lightweight material, a full zip fastening and two open hand pockets. To the top is a tie fastening for a snug fit and DriFit technology is integrated to wick sweat away from the body. Nike branding sits to the chest.

fields.name: Nike Swoosh Hoodie Mens
fields.description: The Nike Swoosh Hoodie features a zipped front fastening and is cut with a regular, relaxed fit making this ideal to wear post training or just to relax.

fields.name: Adidas Essential 3 Stripe Zip Hoody Ladies
fields.description: Update your casual look with this adidas Essential 3 Stripe Zip Hoody. It is perfect for everyday leisurewear thanks to a soft cotton-blend, whilst the elasticated trims provide a comfortable fit. The look is completed with the iconic adidas 3 stripe branding.

fields.name: Adidas Essential 3 Stripe Zip Hoody Ladies
fields.description: Update your casual look with this adidas Essential 3 Stripe Zip Hoody. It is perfect for everyday leisurewear thanks to a soft cotton-blend, whilst the elasticated trims provide a comfortable fit. The look is completed with the iconic adidas 3 stripe branding.

fields.name: Adidas Linear OTH Hoodie Ladies
fields.description: This Adidas Linear OTH Hoodie is crafted in an over the head style with long sleeves. It features a drawstring adjustable hood and two side pockets. This hoodie has a lightweight construction designed with a signature printed logo and is complete with Adidas branding. You do not want to miss out on this one.

fields.name: Adidas Essential 3 Stripe Zip Hoody Ladies
fields.description: Update your casual look with this adidas Essential 3 Stripe Zip Hoody. It is perfect for everyday leisurewear thanks to a soft cotton-blend, whilst the elasticated trims provide a comfortable fit. The look is completed with the iconic adidas 3 stripe branding.

fields.name: Puma No1 Logo Ladies Hoody
fields.description: Grab some simple and stylish clothing and pick up one of these Puma No1 Logo Ladies Hoody! The design features a complimenting cut so that your always looking your best as the fleece lining and long sleeves help to keep you warm and toasty through cold spells. The over head fit allows for easy and quick fitting while reducing nasty biting cold wind from blowing through. Finished with a drawstring adjustable hood for maximum comfort and closure as well as a large front pocket for hand placement or storage.

fields.name: Adidas Fave OTH Hoodie Ladies
fields.description: This adidas Fave OTH Hoodie is an over the head style crafted with long sleeves and ribbed trims for comfort. It features a drawstring adjustable hood and kangaroo pocket for a classic look. This hoodie is a lightweight, printed design with a signature logo and is complete with adidas branding.

fields.name: Under Armour Rival OTH Hoodie Ladies
fields.description: This Under Armour Rival OTH Hoodie is an over the head style crafted with long sleeves and ribbed trims for comfort. This hoodie is a lightweight construction designed with a signature logo and is complete with Under Armour branding.

fields.description: The Womens Nike Sportswear Fleece Full-Zip Hoodie is perfect for everyday wear, featuring a zip fastening front with a ribbed and elasticated trim to the hem and wrist cuffs, completed with the Nike swoosh branding to the upper left chest.

fields.name: Converse OTH Chuck Hoody Ladies
fields.description: Keep things casual with the OTH Chuck Hoody from Converse. Crafted with a central zip and drawstring hood, these fleece lined hoody is perfect for everyday wear.

This skort is a lightweight construction designed with a printed logo and is complete with adidas branding.

fields.description: Reach your peak performance in these adidas Squad Shorts. Made with an elasticated waistband, interior drawstring closure and adidas branding these shorts are a true exercise essential. These shorts use Climate cool technology to keep you cooler for longer.

fields.name: Nike Women's Vintage Shorts
fields.description: A classic style, composed of a drawstring adjustable waistline, two open hand pockets to the sides and split hems for added manoeuvrability. Great for getting your train on.

fields.name: Nike Sportswear Shorts Ladies
fields.description: These Ladies Nike Sportswear Shorts have been engineered with a super soft terry fabric for all-day comfort, whilst the unique wash delivers vintage look and the side pockets allow you to sore your belongings on the go. The shorts come complete with an elasticated waist and drawstring fastening for a secure fit and the Nike branding adds the finishing touch.

fields.name: Nike Dry Shorts Ladies
fields.description: Step it up in the style stakes when keeping fit in these Nike Dry Shorts which are a lightweight construction which feature Dri Fit technology to promote a cool feeling by drawing sweat away from the body leaving you comfortable to continue with your run. Internal briefs are designed to offer you comfort and ventilation as well as offer you more coverage.

fields.name: Nike Women's Hyp Fem Short
fields.description: Set on a branded elasticated waistband, these shorts come in a tight fit featuring brightly coloured floral images and contrast stitching. These shorts are then also crafted with Nike's own signature Nike PRO fabric that sport the DRI-FIT technology that quickly wicks away the sweat from your body to keep you feeling dry and comfortable.

fields.name: Nike Women's Hyp Fem Short

These shorts are then also crafted with Nike's own signature Nike PRO fabric that sport the DRI-FIT technology that quickly wicks away the sweat from your body to keep you feeling dry and comfortable.

fields.description: Keep things casual with this Ladies Nike Air Boyfriend T-Shirt. It is perfect for everyday wear thanks to soft fabrics, whilst also featuring a crew neck and short sleeves. The look is completed in a printed design with Nike branding.

fields.name: USA Pro Yoga Ball
fields.description: This USA Pro Yoga Ball comes complete with a pump and 12 step by step exercises to help improve overall fitness.

fields.name: USA Pro Move Yoga Ball
fields.description: The USA Pro Move Yoga Ball is excellent for toning and strengthening your core muscle group. Half of the ball benefits from a bumped surface which helps tackle and alleviate muscle pains. The ball is finished off with USA Pro branding.

fields.name: Reebok Stability 75cm Gymball
fields.description: Possibly one of the most versatile and accessible pieces of training equipment, a gymball can be used to perform a wide variety of exercises which will considerably improve your core strength, posture and flexibility.

fields.name: Adidas 75cm Gymball
fields.description: A gymball has to offer a fine balance between support and instability, if the ball is too rigid or too soft then the effects on your core stabilising muscles will be compromised. The adidas Gymballs all perform to these optimal levels.

fields.name: USA Pro Resistance Band Set
fields.description: Improve strength with the USA Pro Resistance Band Set. The set features three different latex open-loop bands with low, medium and high resistance varieties making them suitable for all types of training. The open loop feature allows the bands to be completely adjustable so you can change the sizing as needed. These lightweight and versatile bands are easy to carry in your gym bag and can be used for a variety of workouts to help tone and shape muscles.

fields.name: USA Pro Resistance Tubes
fields.description: Target muscles efficiently with the USA Pro Resistance Tubes. Crafted with comfort grip foam handles, the resistance band can be utilised for a variety of exercises and assists with strengthening and sculpting multiple muscle groups at the same time.

fields.name: Everlast Resistance Trainer
fields.description: Enjoy a workout at your own pace with this Everlast Resistance Trainer, featuring an elasticated cord and two ergonomically gripped handles for comfort.

fields.name: Sklz Resistance Cable
fields.description: Designed to offer a total body workout, in a simple yet functional design, the Sklz Resistance Cable is guaranteed to offer superior stretch and resistance. Featuring two flex handles, be sure to elevate your workout game at an everyday low price.

fields.name: Everlast Hand Grips
fields.description: The Everlast Hand Grips are perfect for your next training session, featuring a neoprene construction with palm vents and mesh panels for comfort and breathability. These gloves then also come including EverGel padding to the back of the knuckles that helps to disperse the energy from impact. All whilst a Compress-x strap provides support along the hands and wrist. The gloves are then finished with a touch tape fastening strap to allow for a comfortable fit as well as featuring the signature Everlast logo that completes the look with some fierce brand recognition. Do not miss out on these.

fields.name: PTP Slider Set
fields.description: PTP Slider Set

fields.name: PTP Superband
fields.description: PTP Superband

fields.name: PTP Core Sliders
fields.description: PTP Core Sliders

fields.name: Reebok Power Tube Rack
fields.description: The Reebok Power Tube Rack is simple to assemble, the Reebok Studio Power Tube Rack offers compact storage for up to 36 Reebok Power Tubes and is solely designed for use with this product.Power Tubes can be removed from the rack with ease and placed back after use. Its space saving narrow base ensures the rack can be discreetly stored in the corner of the studio. All in all, the Reebok Power Tube Rack is a stylish and effective storage solution for any gym class environment.

fields.name: Lonsdale Barrel Bag
fields.description: This Lonsdale Barrel Bag is perfect for your sports gear, featuring a zipped main section with added accessory pocket to the side, finished of dual carry handles and adjustable shoulder strap.

fields.name: Nike Brasilia Medium Holdall
fields.description: This Nike Brasilia Medium Holdall is great for carrying your items to the gym or taking on weekends away, featuring a large zipped compartment with small touch and close fastening pouch for valuables. There are two zip pockets to the sides, one of which is gusseted and ventilated for storing clothes or shoes, plus a removable, adjustable padded shoulder strap, carry handle and smaller handle to the side, giving plenty of transportation options. Nike branding completes the look.

fields.name: Wilson Wide Wristband Womens
fields.description: Don't let sweat get in the way of your performance with this Wilson Wide Wristband. This set of 2 are constructed from quick-drying and sweat absorbent fabrication for a comfortable wear and are designed in a colour-block design with an embroidered 'W' for brand recognition.

fields.name: USA Pro Gym Towel
fields.description: The USA Pro Gym Towel is constructed from super-soft micro-fibre fabric which makes the towel quick-drying, lightweight, compact and easier to carry. Designed to fit a standard yoga mat, this towel is perfect for yoga and should fit all mat sizes.

fields.name: Adidas Fitness Gloves
fields.description: These adidas Fitness Gloves are a slip on style crafted with touch closure fastening for a personal fit. They are a fingerless, lightweight construction designed with a signature logo and are complete with adidas branding.

fields.name: Nike Training Belt
fields.description: The Nike Training Belt features a lightweight but firm and supportive construction, ventilation holes across the body increase breathability and a touch tape fastening strap provides a secure fit, completed with the Nike swoosh branding.

fields.name: Reebok Lifting Glove
fields.description: Designed for premium comfort and security, the Lifting Gloves padded leather palm provides complete grip and protection. Featuring a double-loop Velcro strap and breathable mesh material, the gloves enhance support whilst keeping you cool for top performance.

fields.description: Designed for premium comfort and security, the Lifting Gloves padded leather palm provides complete grip and protection. Featuring a double-loop Velcro strap and breathable mesh material, the gloves enhance support whilst keeping you cool for top performance.

fields.name: Karrimor 40L Duffle Bag
fields.description: The Karrimor 40L Duffle Bag is perfect for weekend trips away, featuring a zipped main compartment with a massive 40L of space making it ideal for storing all your belongings. This Karrimor duffle bag also benefits from a padded carry handle as well as two adjustable padded shoulder straps, finished off with Karrimor logo to the sides and straps.

fields.name: Karrimor 90L Duffle Bag
fields.description: The Karrimor 90L Duffle Bag is ideal for weekend trips away with a lockable zip for better security and a spacious main compartment with 90L of space. Two padded carry handles and an adjustable carry strap allow for easy transportation. This hold all also comes with large reflective print of the Karrimor logo to the front and sides of the bag.
